What is FNAF 5?

FNAF 5, also known as Sister Location, takes the series in a new direction. Players must crawl through vents, reset power systems, and perform maintenance while avoiding animatronics like Circus Baby, Ballora, Funtime Freddy, and Funtime Foxy. The game adds voice narration, story-driven cutscenes, and multiple endings, making it one of the most cinematic entries in the series.

How to Play FNAF 5?

  • Perform Maintenance: Complete nightly tasks in different facility rooms.
  • Avoid Detection: Move quietly and use controlled shocks to fend off animatronics.
  • Navigate Vents: Crawl through dark, dangerous vents without alerting enemies.
  • Listen Carefully: Audio cues are crucial for survival against stealthy animatronics.
  • Survive the Week: Last through all shifts to uncover the facilityâ€™s dark secrets.
